overview: In the wraparound segment, a sexy young coed (Ginger Lynn) takes over a boring sex education class with a much more hands-on approach. There's also an erotic take on Casablance ("Memories of Marrakesh" again starring Ginger Lynn), a model profile of Jo Phillips, who was discovered on the beaches of Ibiza by EB producers, and more.
tagline: Have a ball at our school for virgins.
title: Electric Blue 17
